Check if an object is a ggmatrix

Source: R/ggpairs_add.R
is_ggmatrix.Rd

Check if an object is a ggmatrix

Usage

is_ggmatrix(x)

Arguments

x

An object to check

Value

Logical value indicating if the object is a ggmatrix

Examples

is_ggmatrix(ggpairs(mtcars))
#> [1] TRUE
is_ggmatrix(ggplot2::ggplot())
#> [1] FALSE
